TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个类，它可以读写密钥标识符、密钥标识符子句和安全令牌。

span.span: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类将 、 和 类作为 XML 进行读写。Use the class to read and write , , and classes as XML. 类具有确定此类是否可读写这些实体以及实际读写它们的方法。The class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them. 对于安全令牌，这些方法为 、、 和 。For security tokens, these methods are , , , and .
